replies.body:
The REAL question is:
When will NORMAL URF return? Non-random, non-all-5, non-whatever. Just Vanilla Urf.

I'm looking forward to this too, but we don't have any updates on when that game mode will make a return.  :(  Keep your eyes on our patch notes for updates to featured game modes in the meantime.  Fingers crossed!
Do you know at least what the next one is? It isn't on the PBE yet and I would hope to not have an entire month of DarkStar :/
Afraid not.  :/  Content on PBE might also just be for testing, and not necessarily a preparation for the next patch.  We know as soon as you do through the patch notes.
Aww poop. I always look forward to seeing it on PBE before live. Thanks for the response. Hopefully we know something soon. If it is urf, I need to take off work! lol

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hOEc0ghi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-19T15:15:34.369+0000)
>
> I'm looking forward to this too, but we don't have any updates on when that game mode will make a return.  :(  Keep your eyes on our patch notes for updates to featured game modes in the meantime.  Fingers crossed!

Are we talking Urf or ArUrf here?
If you're able to somehow get onto the chinese LoL server to play there they currently have URF from July 18th - 30th. I haven't figured out a way yet myself but I'm still trying!
I know. I'm beyond jealous they had it after us in feb and now we they have it before we do :/
Same. I was trying to get a chinese lol account just to be able to play it :s. May end up having to buy one just so I can play URF lmao
